articles.title: Third-day Sitting of Seventh Congress of WPK Held
articles.content:
Third-day Sitting of Seventh Congress of WPK Held
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The third-day sitting of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place on Sunday.
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, made a conclusion on the first agenda item "Review of work of the Central Committee of the WPK."
					
					 In the conclusion he stressed on the important issues arising in carrying out the vital tasks set forth at the congress.
					
					 The congratulatory message presented to the Seventh Congress of the WPK by all the service personnel and people was read out at the meeting.
					
					 A report on the second agenda item "Review on the work of the Central Auditing Commission of the WPK" was made.
					
					 The reporter said the Party Central Auditing Commission confirmed that the party finance has properly performed its mission and duty and all financial activities have been conducted correctly on the principle of the party in the period under review on the basis of the audit data and reports of the review of the work of the auditing commissions submitted to the provincial party conferences.
					
					 He underlined the need to steadily improve the party's financial management as required by the new era of the Juche revolution.
					
					 The congratulatory group of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) entered the venue of the congress.
					
					 Members of the KCU presented a floral basket to Kim Jong Un, reflecting boundless reverence and loyalty of three million members of the KCU.
					
					 The congratulatory group of the KCU read out the congratulatory message to the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 There took place a study of the report on the review of the work of the C.C., the WPK made by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The decision of the first agenda item "Review of the work of the C.C., the WPK" was adopted at the meeting with approval of all delegates.
					
					 The congratulatory group of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League entered the venue of the congress.
					
					 It presented a floral basket to Kim Jong Un, reflecting the minds of the five million young vanguard.
					
					 It read out the congratulatory message to the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 The congress goes on.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes Conclusion on Review of Work of WPK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes Conclusion on Review of Work of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The respected Comrade Kim Jong Un made a conclusion of the review of the work of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea at the third-day sitting of the Seventh Congress of the WPK held on Sunday.
					 Kim Jong Un indicated the issues arising in implementing the tasks set forth in the report.
					
					 The main spirit of the Seventh Congress of the WPK is to give full play to the spirit of giving priority to the self-development principle under the uplifted banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and wage a general attack and death-defying campaign and thus accelerate the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 "Let the whole party, the entire army and all the people go all out for the implementation of the tasks advanced at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea to fasten the final victory of the Juche revolution!" This is the slogan to be held up by our Party, army and people in their struggle.
					
					 It is necessary to intensify the work of establishing the monolithic leadership system of the party on a high stage.
					
					 The whole party, the entire army and all the people should be firmly armed with Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, get united around the Party Central Committee as firm as a rock and the party organizations at all levels should push forward this work, taking it as the key point of the party work and activities.
					
					 It is necessary to continue to carry out the party's strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 This strategic line is the most revolutionary and scientific one reflecting the lawful requirements of building a thriving socialist nation and the specific conditions of our country.
					
					 Organizational and political work should be intensified to carry out the important tasks set forth at the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 All the party organizations should purposefully and meticulously organize the political and ideological work for arousing the masses to implementing the strategic line and policy advanced by the Party Congress and conduct intensive ideological offensive by mobilizing all propaganda and agitation forces and means.
					
					 The party organizations and officials have to organize and command the work in a responsible manner in order to implement the important tasks set forth at the Congress.
					
					 The might of the great army-people unity and the might of army-people coordinated operations should be highly displayed in the drive of carrying out the tasks advanced at the Congress.
					
					 The revolutionary enthusiasm and morale of the army and people of the DPRK have been unprecedentedly raised with the 7th Congress of the WPK as an occasion, Kim Jong Un said, expressing the conviction that the whole party, the entire army and all the people would turn out as one and courageously wage the general offensive for carrying out the grand programme advanced by the Seventh Congress of the WPK and demonstrate the high dignity and invincible spirit of the great party guided by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Decision of Seventh Congress of WPK Adopted
articles.content:
Decision of Seventh Congress of WPK Adopted
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A decision "On the review of the work of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" was adopted at the third-day meeting of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) held on May 8.
					 The decision accepted the report on the review of the work of the Party Central Committee made by the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un as the immortal banner which indicated the bright road for the WPK and the developing revolution and a great programme that paved the path to be taken by the Juche revolution for all ages and fully supported and approved it.
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the WPK expressed the steadfast resolution to accelerate the victory of the cause of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism, national reunification and the cause of global independence under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, holding President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as the eternal leaders of the WPK in high esteem. It went on:
					
					 We will push forward the work of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism to strengthen the political, military and economic might in every way.
					
					 All the fields will thoroughly implement the behests of the great leaders and strengthen the WPK, the state and army into those of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il forever.
					
					 We will consolidate the position of the political and military power and fly the flag of victory on the eminence of the scientific and technological power, an economic giant and a highly civilized nation.
					
					 We will take the general line of socialist construction and the principle of self-development as the constant strategic line, win a great victory in building a thriving socialist nation and successfully realize the historic cause of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism.
					
					 We will make a new leap forward in the development of the country's science and technology, open up an era prospering with science and bring about a revolutionary turn in socialist construction in a short span of time.
					
					 We will work out the phased strategy for the national economic development in a scientific and realistic manner and carry it out without fail and carry through the five-year strategy for the state economic development from 2016 to 2020 for the present.
					
					 We will accelerate the building of a highly civilized socialist country and thus bring up all the people to be able men for the socialist construction with profound knowledge and cultural attainments, and provide them with conditions and environment for leading a wealthy and a highly civilized life to their heart's content.
					
					 We will accept it as the general duty to be held fast to in army building to model the entire army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and thoroughly implement it.
					
					 We stand for national reunification by federal formula and will make every possible effort for peace and reunification. But if the south Korean authorities opt for a war, persisting in the unreasonable "unification of social systems", we will turn out in the just war to mercilessly wipe out the anti-reunification forces and achieve the historic cause of national reunification, long-cherished desire of all the Koreans.
					
					 We will make positive efforts to ensure durable peace on the Korean peninsula and reunify the country by federal formula under the banners of national independence and great national unity and thus build an independent and prosperous reunified country, the common desire of all Koreans, as soon as possible.
					
					 We will regard the idea of independence, peace and friendship as the steadfast guidelines of our external activities, develop the good neighborly, friendly and cooperative relations with those countries which respect the sovereignty of the DPRK and remain friendly to it, and strive for regional peace and security and global independence.
					
					 The WPK and the DPRK government will take to the invariable path of independence, Songun and socialism no matter how the situation and relationship with neighboring countries may change, and play a vanguard role as the defender of independence and justice in the struggle for global independence.
					
					 We will wage a vigorous struggle to put a definite end to the danger of a nuclear war, imposed by the U.S., with a powerful nuclear deterrence and defend the regional and global peace.
					
					 We will consistently take hold on the strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force and boost self-defensive nuclear force both in quality and quantity as long as the imperialists persist in their nuclear threat and arbitrary practices.
					
					 As a responsible nuclear weapons state, the DPRK will not use a nuclear weapon first unless its sovereignty is encroached upon by hostile aggression forces with nukes, as it had already declared, and it will faithfully fulfill its commitment to nuclear non-proliferation it made to the international community, and strive for the denuclearization of the world.
					
					 The WPK and the DPRK government will get united and cooperate with all the countries and nations aspiring after independence and loving justice, irrespective of differences in ideology and social system, and improve and normalize the relations with those countries that respect the sovereignty of the DPRK and are friendly towards it, though they had been hostile toward it in the past.
					
					 We will steadily develop the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and increase its leadership role in every way and thus bring about a fresh turn in the historic struggle for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The WPK would lead with confidence our people's revolutionary struggle and construction work along the road of victory, holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem at the top post of the Juche revolution.
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the WPK expressed the belief that the entire party and all the people would get firmly united around Kim Jong Un and courageously wage the general offensive and general charge for the development of the party, accomplishment of the socialist cause, independent reunification of the country and global independence under the revolutionary banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Seventh Congress of WPK from Service Personnel and People of DPRK
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Seventh Congress of WPK from Service Personnel and People of DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The service personnel of the Korean People's Army and people of the DPRK sent a congratulatory message to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on May 6.
					 The message noted that the Seventh Congress of the WPK was a great national jubilee that proudly reviewed the history of glorious victories and prosperity the party of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism achieved, and a grand political festival that unrolled a bright blueprint for accomplishing the cause of socialism.
					
					 Hundreds of years have passed since the politics of parties began to be recorded in the world history of politics and the world witnessed the ruling parties that bragged about their exploits in their eras, but it is only the WPK that created an example unprecedented in human history by carrying out the gigantic socio-political tasks of national liberation and class and human emancipation, remaining undeterred by any global political tempest since its foundation, and thus brought perfect victories to the people, the message said, adding:
					
					 It is the greatest honor and happiness of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to struggle for the final victory of the Juche revolution, while leading the most dignified life under the care of the WPK that is shining along with the sacred august names of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il and their undying feats and is under the seasoned and experienced leadership of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We will uphold Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il as the eternal leaders of the party and the revolution and the sun of Juche for all ages and thoroughly implement their last instructions and thus demonstrate before the whole world the dignity and honor of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 No force on earth can check the advance of the service personnel and people of the DPRK dashing forward like the wind toward the final victory with their hearts filled with the revolutionary idea of the party, the revolutionary spirit of Paektu and the sprit of the blizzards of Paektu.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a congratulatory message from Jeronimo Osa Osa Ecoro, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, on May 4.
					 The message said upon hearing the news that the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK published a decision on holding the Seventh Congress of the WPK on May 6, 2016 which would be strengthened as the party of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, party members of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea and supporters extended the sincerest and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un, and, through him, to the leadership of the WPK, party members and all the Korean people on behalf of Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, founder-chairman of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea.
					
					 It hoped that the congress would be celebrated with splendor as it is a very important and significant national event on the road of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of South West Africa People's Organizational Party
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of South West Africa People's Organizational Party
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a congratulatory message from Nangolo Mbumba, general secretary of the South West Africa People's Organizational Party, on May 3.
					 The message said that the party extended congratulations to the WPK on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the revolutionary WPK.
					
					 It noted that over the last period, the WPK has performed a vanguard role in awakening and uniting the working people of the DPRK for the struggle of opposing the imperialists' exploitation and oppression and defending its dignity and right, and thus enjoyed strong support from the progressive parties and working people of the world.
					
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would steadily grow stronger, it extended firm solidarity once again to the just cause and struggle of the WPK to oppose imperialism and defend social justice worldwide.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health.
					
					 It expressed firm belief that the dynamic WPK would steadily and successfully guide the great Korean nation for the generation to come under the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from First Secretary of C.C., Ukrainian Communist Party
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from First Secretary of C.C., Ukrainian Communist Party
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a congratulatory message from Petro Nikolayevich Symonenko, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Ukrainian Communist Party, on May 2.
					 The Ukrainian party leader in his message extended sincere congratulations to the delegates and guests of the Seventh Congress of the WPK, an important political event of the party and the state, and all communists and heroic people of the DPRK on behalf of the C.C., the Ukrainian Communist Party and on his own behalf. 
					
					 The message noted that the Seventh Congress of the WPK is to be held under the complicated situation in which an overall crisis of capitalist system in the world is deepening and geopolitical contradictions festering internationally.
					
					 Under such situation, the WPK has invariably adhered to its firm line while successfully ensuring the country's stable development, it said.
					
					 It wished the WPK Congress success in its work.
					
					 It expressed belief that the decisions of the congress would make a contribution to further reinforcing the party's ranks and enhancing its authority in the society.

articles.title: Greetings to WPK from Communist Party of Portugal
articles.content:
Greetings to WPK from Communist Party of Portugal
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNAA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on May 2 received a congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Portugal on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					 The message noted that the congress would make a contribution to realizing the greatest desire of the working class and other people of the DPRK to achieve peace, social progress and Korea's reunification.
					
					 The message said the Communist Party of Portugal always remembers the fact that the WPK has carried forward the ardent patriotism and revolutionary tradition displayed by the Korean people in the struggle for the liberation from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists and the matchless self-sacrificing spirit demonstrated by them in the 1950-1953 war against the U.S. imperialists and in the struggle to defend the country's sovereignty from the threat of imperialists, the main cause of tension and the danger of a war in the region over the last several decades.
					
					 It expressed solidarity of the Communist Party of Portugal with the WPK in its efforts to achieve Korea's peaceful reunification, seek the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea and the region and attain the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula, peace and social progress.

articles.title: IIJI Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
IIJI Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) led by Secretary General Kenichi Ogami visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 The members of the delegation paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 They made bows to the great leaders who lie in state.
					
					 They looked round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Polish Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Polish Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was posted by the Polish branch of the Korean Friendship Association on its new website "Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea" on May 3.
					 The work, published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), serves as a great programme for the party building and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the WPK that paved a new way for building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, and indicates the way for developing the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung for all ages.
					
					 The Korean film "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un" and songs praising the party such as "We Sing of the Party" and photos introducing the emblem of the WPK and the grand monumental edifices including the Monument to Party Founding which were built under the leadership of the WPK were also posted on the website.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Mexican Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Mexican Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work  "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was posted by the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on its website on May 3 on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the WPK. 
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the WPK is the proud course in which it has taken responsible care of the people and led the Korean revolution to victory under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Meeting for Congratulating WPK on Its 7th Congress Held in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Meeting for Congratulating WPK on Its 7th Congress Held in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Bulgaria on April 28 on the occasion of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present at the meeting were figures of the political parties, organizations and institutions such as the Bulgarian Communists' Party, the Bulgarian Anti-Fascist Union, the Bulgarian Communists Union, the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association and Kim Il Sung Library in Sofia and masses.
					
					 The chairman of the Bulgarian Communists' Party who doubles as chairman of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association in a report extended the sincerest congratulations to Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, on the occasion of the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 He stressed that the congress would be a significant one as it would consolidate the position and role of the WPK and dynamically propel the Korean people to accomplishing the cause of building a thriving socialist nation and reunifying the country.
					
					 Speakers including the chairman of the Central Council of the Bulgarian Anti-Fascist Union and the honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union said that it is the great joy of not only the Korean people but also the Bulgarian people that Kim Jong Un was elected the delegate to the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 They hoped that the Korean people would continue to win only victory in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and making the world independent under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Foreign Organizations, Institutions Observe 7th Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Foreign Organizations, Institutions Observe 7th Congress of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Foreign organizations and institutions posted special write-ups on their websites from April 27 to 30 on the occasion of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on a website an article titled "Invincible Korean-style socialism" accompanied with a photo showing the Korean people single-mindedly united around their leader.
					
					 The article said that Korean-style socialism that applied the idea of believing in the people as in Heaven of President Kim Il Sung, founding father of socialist Korea, and of leader Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK, is being further developed by HE Kim Jong Un under his policy of attaching importance to the people and respecting and loving them.
					
					 The Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship said in an article that the congress will comprehensively review the proud successes the WPK registered in the revolution and construction under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and work out the bright blueprint for bringing earlier the final victory of the Korean revolution under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the SANA introduced in detail the history of the WPK which is leading the Korean revolution and cause of human independence to victory under the banner of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 The Polish branch of the Korean Friendship Association posted photos dealing with the struggle of the Korean people for greeting the 7th Congress of the WPK as a glorious one of victors.

articles.title: Austrian Organization Protests S. Korean Puppet Force's Group Allurement and Abduction of DPRK's Citizens
articles.content:
Austrian Organization Protests S. Korean Puppet Force's Group Allurement and Abduction of DPRK's Citizens
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche idea in Vienna sent a letter to the south Korean puppet embassy in Vienna on May 4 in protest against the south Korean puppet force's group allurement and abduction of the DPRK's citizens.
					 The letter strongly accused the south Korean authorities of their unethical group allurement and abduction and strongly urged them to send back the citizens of the DPRK as soon as possible.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The recent group allurement and abduction can never be justified as it is a brigandish act of ruthlessly violating the dignity, freedom and value of human being.
					
					 We once again strongly urge the south Korean authorities to sincerely apologize for the recent abduction before the international community and immediately send the DPRK citizens back home where their parents are waiting.

articles.title: Celebrada tercera jornada de VII Congreso de PTC
articles.content:
Celebrada tercera jornada de VII Congreso de PTC
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- Se realizo el dia 8 la tercera jornada del VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					El Primer Secretario del PTC, Kim Jong Un, pronuncio las palabras de conclusion sobre la primera agenda "Balance de las labores del Comite Central del PTC".
					
					  En la ocasion el Mariscal subrayo los asuntos importantes para materializar las tareas programaticas presentadas en el VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					  En el Congreso se dio lectura al mensaje de felicitacion de todos los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y el pueblo al VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					  Y hubo el informe sobre la segunda agenda "Balance de las labores de la Comision Central Revisora del PTC".
					
					El informante subrayo que basandose en los datos de revision realizada por la central y los informes sobre el balance de las labores de las comisiones revisoras presentados ante las conferencias provinciales del Partido, el CCR confirmo que durante el periodo de que se revise las finanzas del Partido cumplieron exactamente su mision y deber y todas las actividades financieras se realizaron correctamente en los principios partidistas.
					
					Y enfatizo la necesidad de mejorar y fortalecer constantemente la administracion financiera del Partido conforme a la demanda de la nueva epoca de la revolucion del Juche.
					
					Entro en la sede del conclave el grupo de felicitacion de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea.
					
					El grupo de felicitacion entrego al Mariscal un cesto de flores reflejando el infinito respeto y fidelidad de 3 millones de miembros de la ONC y dio lectura al mensaje de felicitacion dedicado al VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					En el conclave se realizo el estudio sobre el informe de las labores del CC del PTC pronunciado por el Mariscal.
					
					Y fue aprobada por unanimidad la resolucion sobre la primera agenda "Balance de las labores del Comite Central del PTC".
					
					Entro en la sede del conclave el grupo de felicitacion de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung.
					
					Tras entregar al Mariscal un cesto de flores reflejando el alma de 5 millones de vanguardias juveniles, el grupo de felicitacion de la UJS dio lectura al mensaje de felicitacion dedicado al VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Continua el Congreso.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un pronuncia palabras de conclusion sobre balance de labores de CC de PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un pronuncia palabras de conclusion sobre balance de labores de CC de PTC
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un pronuncio las palabras de conclusion sobre el balance de las labores del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la tercera jornada del VII Congreso del PTC efectuada el dia 8.
					El Mariscal aclaro los problemas que se presentan en materializar las tareas indicadas en el informe sobre las labores del Comite Central del PTC.
					
					El espiritu principal del VII Congreso del PTC es adelantar la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche librando una ofensiva general y batalla decisiva general bajo la bandera del gran Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y con el espiritu de dar prioridad al autofortalecimiento. 
					
					"!Avancemos vigorosamente todo el partido, ejercito y pueblo para materializar las tareas del VII Congreso y anticipemos la victoria final de la revolucion del Juche!", esto es la consigna de lucha a ser enarbolada por nuestro Partido, ejercito y pueblo. 
					
					Se debe profundizar en la etapa alta la labor para el establecimiento del sistema de unica direccion del partido. 
					
					Todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo deben armarse con firmeza con el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y unirse compactamente en torno al Comite Central del Partido y las organizaciones partidistas a todos los niveles deben impulsar energicamente esta labor como asunto primordial de las labores y actividades partidistas. 
					
					Hay que seguir materializando cabalmente la linea estrategica del Partido de desarrollar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Esta linea estrategica es la mas revolucionaria y cientifica que refleja la demanda legitima de la construccion de la potencia socialista y la realidad concreta de nuestro pais.
					
					Hay que fortalecer la labor organizativa y politica para materializar las tareas programaticas presentadas por el VII Congreso del Partido.
					
					Todas las organizaciones partidistas deben organizar con objetivos determinados la labor politico-ideologica y librar una intensa ofensiva ideologica con la movilizacion de todas las fuerzas y medios de propaganda y agitacion para llamar a las masas populares a la materializacion de la linea estrategica y orientaciones presentadas por el Congreso. 
					
					  Las organizaciones y funcionarios del Partido deben hacer con responsabilidad la labor organizativa y el mando para llevar a cabo las tareas programaticas presentadas por el VII Congreso del Partido.
					
					  Es importante poner de pleno manifiesto el poderio de la gran unidad y la operacion cooperativa entre los militares y civiles en la lucha por materializar las tareas del Congreso del Partido.
					
					  El Mariscal dijo que el entusiasmo revolucionario y el impetu de lucha de nuestro ejercito y pueblo se aumentan mas que nunca y expreso la conviccion de que todo el Partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo, levantados como un solo hombre, desarrollaran con audacia la ofensiva general para materializar  el gran programa presentado por el VII Congreso del PTC y exaltaran a todo el mundo la alta dignidad y el poderio invicto del gran Partido Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista.

articles.title: Aprobada resolucion en VII Congreso de PTC
articles.content:
Aprobada resolucion en VII Congreso de PTC
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- En la tercera jornada del VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, efectuada el dia 8, fue aprobada la resolucion "Sobre el balance de las labores del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea".
					La nota apoya totalmente el informe sobre el balance de las labores del Comite Central del Partido, pronunciado por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, aceptandolo como inmortal bandera que ilumina el futuro radiante del PTC y del desarrollo de la revolucion y como gran programa que abrio el camino eterno de la revolucion del Juche. 
					
					El VII Congreso del PTC expreso la firme decision de enaltecer al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como eternos lideres del PTC y adelantar la victoria de la causa de transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, la reunificacion de la patria y la causa de verificacion de la independencia en el mundo entero bajo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Se debe ampliar y fortalecer por todos los medios el poderio politico, militar y economico acelerando activamente la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo. 
					
					En todos los dominios deben materializar cabalmente los legados de los grandes Lideres antecesores y desarrollar el PTC, el Estado y el ejercito como los eternos de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Hay que consolidar la posicion de la potencia politica y militar y colocar la bandera de victoria en la cima de la potencia cientifico-tecnica, la economica y la civilizada. 
					
					Tomando la linea general de la construccion socialista y el principio de dar primacia al autofortalecimiento como lineas estrategicas permanentes, lograremos la gran victoria en la construccion de la potencia socialista y llevaremos a feliz termino la historica causa de transformar toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo. 
					
					Lograremos en corto plazo nuevos saltos en el desarrollo de ciencias y tecnicas, abriremos la era que prosperara con las ciencias y registraremos un cambio revolucionario en la construccion socialista.
					
					Hay que elaborar de manera cientifica y realista y ejecutar sin falta la estrategia por etapas para el desarrollo de la economia nacional y cumplir por inmediato la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional desde 2016 hasta 2020.
					
					Hace falta acelerar la construccion de la potencia socialista civilizada para formar a todos los habitantes como poderosos sujetos de la construccion socialista con abundantes conocimientos y elevadas facultades culturales y ofrecerles las condiciones y el ambiente favorables a disfrutar a sus anchas de una vida abundante y culta. 
					
					Se debe aceptar la transformacion de todo el ejercito segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo como deber general de la construccion del ejercito y realizarlo sin falta. 
					
					Insistimos en la reunificacion segun el sistema federal y hacemos todos los esfuerzos por la reunificacion pacifica, pero, si las autoridades optan al fin y al cabo el camino de guerra persistiendo en la injusta "unificacion institucional", eliminaremos sin piedad a las fuerzas anti-reunificacion mediante la gran guerra justa de reunificacion y lograremos la causa historica de la reunificacion, deseo de toda la nacion.
					
					Enarbolaremos en alto la bandera de la independencia nacional y la gran unidad nacional y nos esforzaremos activamente por realizar la reunificacion mediante la forma del sistema federal, de modo que construiremos lo mas pronto posible una potencia reunificada independiente y prospera, a que desean todos los coreanos.
					
					　Al tomar el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad como inconmovible guia de las actividades exteriores, ampliaremos y desarrollaremos las relaciones de buena vecindad, amistad y cooperacion con varios paises del mundo que respetan la soberania de nuestro pais y nos tratan amistosamente, asi como nos esforzaremos mucho por defender la paz y seguridad de la region y realizar la independencia del mundo.
					
					  El PTC y el gobierno de la RPDC marcharan rectamente siguiendo la ruta invariable de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo, independientemente del cambio de la situacion y de las relaciones entre los paises contornos y cumpliran el papel vanguardista en la lucha por realizar la independencia del mundo como defensores de la independencia y la justicia.
					
					  Apoyandose en el poderoso disuasivo nuclear acabaran de raiz con el peligro de guerra nuclear impuesto por los Estados Unidos y lucharan con dinamismo por defender la paz de la region y el resto del mundo.
					
					  Intensificaran aun mas en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo las fuerzas armadas nucleares de autodefensa tomando permanentemente la linea estrategica de desarrollar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares, mientras que sigan la amenaza nuclear y la arbitrariedad de los imperialistas.
					
					Como ya aclaro, la RPDC, como responsable pais poseedor de armas nucleares, no sera primera en usar las armas nucleares contra las agresivas fuerzas hostiles si estas no violan con sus artefactos nucleares a nuestra soberania, y se esforzara por realizar la desnuclearizacion del mundo ejecutando con sinceridad su deber de no proliferacion nuclear asumido ante la sociedad internacional.
					
					  El PTC y el gobierno de la RPDC se uniran y cooperaran con todos los paises y naciones aspirantes a la independencia y amantes de la justicia sin consideracion a las diferencias de ideas y regimenes.
					
					Igualmente, mejoraran y normalizaran las relaciones con los paises que respetan la soberania de nuestro pais y nos tratan amistosamente aunque en el pasado tuvieron las relaciones hostiles con nuestro pais.
					
					  Lograran un nuevo viraje en la lucha historica por trasformar toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, al fortalecer y desarrollar incesantemente el PTC como partido de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y elevar por todos los medios el papel directivo del Partido.  
					
					  La resolucion subraya que el PTC conducira con toda seguridad por el camino de victoria la lucha de revolucion y la construccion del pueblo coreano sosteniendo al Mariscal Kim Jong Un en supremo cargo de la revolucion del Juche.
					
					  El VII Congreso del PTC expreso la confianza de que todo el Partido y todo el pueblo, unidos firmemente en torno al Mariscal, desarrollaran con dinamismo la ofensiva general por fortalecer y desarrollar el Partido, llevar feliz termino la causa socialista y realizar la reunificacion independiente de la patria y la causa de independencia del mundo enarbolando la bandera revolucionaria del Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.

articles.title: Militares y habitantes envian mensaje de felicitacion a VII Congreso de PTC
articles.content:
Militares y habitantes envian mensaje de felicitacion a VII Congreso de PTC
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- Los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y otros habitantes enviaron el dia 6 un mensaje de felicitacion al VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					La misiva senala que el presente conclave deviene el gran jubilo nacional que balancea con orgullo la historia del glorioso triunfo y prosperidad del gran Partido de Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y el gran festival politico para preparar el dibujo perspectivo por el cumplimiento de la causa socialista.
					
					Ya pasaron cientos de anos desde cuando fue registrada la politica por el partido politico y hubo los partidos gubernamentales que hacian alarde de sus meritos. Pero, solo el Partido del Trabajo de Corea dio el triunfo perfecto al pueblo sin ningun defecto creando desde su fundacion hasta la fecha el ejemplo de significacion historica para la humanidad en el proceso de cumplir las grandiosas tareas sociopoliticas de la liberacion nacional, clasista y humana sin cualquier vacilacion ante las dificultades politicas del mundo, elogia.
					
					Aclara que el ejercito y el pueblo considera como gran gloria y felicidad la lucha por la victoria final de la revolucion del Juche disfrutando de una vida mas digna en el regazo del PTC que se exalta por los nombres venerables y las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y recibe la habil y probada direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Subraya que enalteceran para siempre al Presidente y el Dirigente como eternos Lideres del partido y la revolucion y sol del Juche y materializaran hasta el fin los legados de estos grandes Lideres, de manera que manifestaran plenamente la dignidad y la gloria de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y la Corea de Kim Jong Il.
					
					En este mundo no hay ninguna fuerza capaz de impedir el avance del ejercito y pueblo de Corea que avanzan a toda velocidad hacia la victoria final, guardando en cada corazon la idea revolucionaria del Partido y el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, espiritu del viento cortante del Paektu, concluye.
